Based on your preferences for a haunted house movie, I would recommend watching "Leviathan." It follows the story of Kolya, who is forced to fight against corrupt officials when he is told that his house will be demolished. He recruits a lawyer friend to help, but the man' s arrival brings further misfortune for Kolya and his family.

The other recommended movie, "Sorority Row," also follows the story of sorority sisters who try to cover up the death of their house-neighbor after a prank gone wrong. However, they are stalked by a serial killer who is out to take revenge on them for their past wrongdoings.

Lastly, there's another recommended movie, "Tom' s Midnight Garden," which follows the story of a young boy named Tom who travels across boundaries of reality to an extraordinary place called a secret, haunted house.

The main story revolves around the group of individuals (each with their own ties and agendas with the town and each other)) converge on the enclave. Strange things begin to happen. Very strange things. Strange enough to test (and then break) the very fabric of reality itself.
The movie stars Adrienne King, Glenn Morshower.
